ars_nouveau.subform_icon_tooltip: Subforms: Gives the rest of the spell a new form or edits its behavior.
effect.sauce.contingency.desc: When a specific event triggers, it will cast the spell on the entity.
sauce.perk.abjuration_power.desc: Increases the power of abjuration spells.
sauce.perk.abjuration_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from abjuration spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.air_power.desc: Increases the power of air spells.
sauce.perk.air_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from air spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.earth_power.desc: Increases the power of earth spells.
sauce.perk.earth_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from earth spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.elemental_power.desc: Increases the power of elemental spells.
sauce.perk.elemental_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from elemental spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.fire_power.desc: Increases the power of fire spells.
sauce.perk.fire_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from fire spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.mana_discount.desc: Reduces the mana cost of spells.
sauce.perk.manipulation_power.desc: Increases the power of manipulation spells.
sauce.perk.manipulation_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from manipulation spells and blockshaping. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.necromancy_power.desc: Increases the power of anima spells.
sauce.perk.necromancy_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from anima spells. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.spell_crit.desc: Chance of critical strikes with spells.
sauce.perk.spell_crit_damage.desc: Damage increase of spell critical strikes.
sauce.perk.summon_power.desc: Increases the power of summoning spells.
sauce.perk.summon_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from summoning spells and summons. Exponential decay formula.
sauce.perk.water_power.desc: Increases the power of water spells.
sauce.perk.water_resistance.desc: Reduces damage taken from water spells. Exponential decay formula.
tooltip.sauce.caster_tome: Mimics the abilities of a school focus.
